author: Cedric Canard
content:
Those photos are so sharp and crisp, and the tones look so rich. Like you Andreas, I will set my camera to B&W at times. Many photographers I know don't understand why I do that ("what if it looks better in colour?", "if you shoot in colour at least you have a choice") so it's nice to see someone else who gets it as I do.

The Eve Bar shot is a classic ðŸ™‚
